replies.body: Opinions on the Mapdev / Builder team?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on the Mapdev / Builder team?

replies.body: Could be a lot better, get's salty very easily (Some of them), some of them are alright
replies.body_tagged: Could be a lot better, get's salty very easily (Some of them), some of them are alright

replies.body: The maps they produce are really good, the staff just don't get around to the map releases though, we haven't had new maps for a while.
replies.body_tagged: The maps they produce are really good, the staff just don't get around to the map releases though, we haven't had new maps for a while.

replies.body:
Favorite map?
One of the best memories on Avicus(/Mc Zone)
Which person do you like the most?
Favorite team?

Have a nice day! =)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Quintus

Have a few memories: When I joined MCZone, playing my first game on Rendezvous, and probably seeing jozz in the lobby for the first time xd

I have been good friends with Holden58, 28cheetah and NDLFC for around 3 years now :D

I'm assuming you mean sports team, definitely Port Adelaide Power (Aussie Rules Football)

Thanks, you too! :D

replies.body:
No hard feelings guys.

Favourite Mod? FrostedCupcakez and PokerFace Least Favourite Mod? Myworld6
Favourite Senior? Pizza Least favourite Senior? ProfessorUtonium
Favourite Admin? sessp
Opinions? Don't know you too well, pretty good mod from what I have seen, good at pvp.
Worst staff rank? Builder
Favourite staff rank? Media (If we are including that)
Pick 3 people to be promoted to a rank? 
AtditC --> Mod
Clijmart --> Builder
Spoookeh --> Mod
